def: dealer !  mjpeg_encoder ! recorder path=/home/picam360/rec_@FIRST_STORED_TIME@/@TIME_STAMP@.jpeg ! mjpeg_decoder ! v4l2_tegra_encoder name=encoder br=@APP.BITRATE_KBPS@ preset=ultrafast

params.dealer.def: mux name=mux! pcuda_remapper name=remapper maptype=WINDOW fov=90 ignore_view_params=1 s=@APP.SIZE@ n_vstreams=1
params.mux.vin0: redis watch=pserver-nmea watch=pserver-encoder watch=pserver-imu ! v4l2_capture name=capture s=@APP.CAM0@ ! mjpeg_tegra_decoder name=decoder cudamem=@JPGDEC.CUDAMEM@
